name: Sweet Bubble Pop Diamond
description:
Sweet Bubble Pop Diamond is a very interesting puzzle game,this match 3 casual game can kill your boring time wherever you are.
Game is an original classic bubbles game with retro style , and the zuma diamonds can bring you the best game experience.
How to play
- Tap the place where you want to shoot your bubble.
- Aiming and shooting to match 3 or more same colored bubbles.
- Tap on the swappable bubble to match more bubbles.
- Boost your score with power-ups and combos to get more fun.
